[/size][size=3]
This is a standalone MOD to add New follower, named Yoon.




His appearance almost same with my mod 'MELONFOLLOWERS - 4 VILKAS'

Than.....wonder why I've made this new mod?

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3][img]https://66.media.tumblr.com/8f7fe3d0ba24a147d258d35f03365349/tumblr_ocu3jzV5e01tnj94io1_1280.png[/img]

Enjoy your Skyrim!!!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Location : Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

Race : Nord Race

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Body Type : Follow your body mod[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]

Height : 1.00

Weight : 40.0

Voice Type : MaleYoungEager (Same Onmund)

Class : CombatWarrior1H

Tag : Essential / PotentialMarriageFaction / LightFoot Perk





[/size][i][size=4][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/i][size=3]

[/size]Only Skyrim.
[b][i][size=4]
